short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension to click a button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension for YouTube.com website only, that finds a "Skip Ad" button in the player and automatically clicks on it so that a user doesn't have to do that manually.
